price: Kwa hakika wale walio kufuru watanadiwa: Bila ya shaka kukuchukieni Mwenyezi Mungu ni kukubwa kuliko kujichukia nyinyi nafsi zenu, mlipo kuwa mnaitwa kwenye Imani nanyi mkakataa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُنَادَوۡنَ لَمَقۡتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ مِن مَّقۡتِكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ إِذۡ تُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَتَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū yunādawna lamaqtu al-lahi akbaru min maqtikum anfusakum idh tud'ʿawna ilā al-īmāni fatakfurūna
translations: will be cried out to them
